chapters.title: Chapter 1: Lion on the Hill
chapters.info: General Souran Maravaile, p. 66 (78)—Artur Hawkwing's greatest general. He was the husband of Ishara, the first Queen of Andor. He was one of the greatest swordsmen to ever live. He was the leader of the seige of Tar Valon for the final year of it. See also Maravaile, Ishara.
